channel.title: PkIsle X + Some random pics + first war on pkisle x vid lol
channel.description:
From drop party today, he used white scimitar special lol.
[IMG]http://i9.tinypic.com/643ppuu[/img]
Lol
[IMG]http://img516.imageshack.us/img516/7531/tankstade8.png[/img]
Oo, naughty gootang.
[IMG]http://i11.tinypic.com/4yi6tuh[/img]
FIRST VID OF WAR ON PKISLE X - DI VS TAB - 15 VS 15 - VIDDED BY X LASAGNE X
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xs8IaTAzWgA]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xs8IaTAzWgA[/url]
YOU NEED PKISLE X CLIENT TO PLAY DOWNLOAD HERE
http://rapidshare.com/files/47973683/PkIsle_X_Client__.rar.html
OR
http://uppit.com/d/CD1CJ
OR
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=RJH2WA26
~PkIsle X~
Welcome to the Revolution of PkIsle. With the help of an amazing staff of developers and web designers, and the testing, support, and suggestions from various players, we are proud to bring you PkIsle X.
Fully Evolved from what you used to know, but the same great features you used to love. We have enhanced this server far beyond expectations. We are a friendly community based on the commitment to create a unique server with a stable economy and an enjoyable atmosphere.
Equiped with mini-games, new maps, new weapons, new drops, new skill features, we are confident you will have a blast and meet some new people.
For a quick trailer go here:
http://www.youtube.com/v/A1n7K-exEY4
Or download it here for better quality
http://files.filefront.com//;8209264;;/
-Features- Magic *Regular Magic Spells [Combat + Weakening + Binding + Telegrab]* *Ancient Magic Spells [Effects]* *Blood Runes* *Projectiles + Emotes* *Every single magic spell works* Range *DarkBow* *ShortBows + LongBows* *Arrow Requirements with Bows* *Projectiles + Emotes* *Throwing Projectiles [Knives and Obby Rings]* Combat *Weapon Special Attacks [DDS : x2; Whip : Max Hit; White Scimmy : Secret]* *Armour + Barrows Stat Requirements* *Correct Weapon Speeds* *Weapon Emotes* RuneCrafting *Regular Alter [All Runes Besides Bloods and Deaths]* *Dark Alter [Wilderness Alter Requires 90 RC, Bloods and Deaths]* *Soul Tiara; x2 Runes, 1/2 Delay* *Emotes + GFX* *NO REQUIRED ESSENCE* Thieving *Various Stalls with Different Rewards + Level Requirements* *Great Starter Cash!* Fishing *Various Fishing Spots* *AutoFish Feature* *Random Chance on Catching based on Level* *Fishing Emotes* Cooking *AutoCook Feature* *Random Burning based on Level* *Cooking Emotes* Woodcutting *AutoCut Feature* *Speed Based on Axe* FireMaking *Fires on Ground* *Deletes Log* *Different Level Requirements and EXP Gained for Logs* *FireMaking Emotes* Agility *Advanced Agility Course* *Emotes + Crossing Log/Rope + Crawl through Tube* *Agility ShortCuts To Be Added* Farming *Clear Patches* *Plant Herb Seed* *Wait for Growth* *Plant actually GROWS* Smithing *Correct Interface* *Levels and Bars Required* Mining *Mining Ore Speed based on Level* *Random Gems* Slayer *First Monsters OutSide Portal* *Slayer Tower With Many Monsters* *Special Drops for Higher Monsters* Minigames *Khazard Adventure [Rewards : Khazard Torso, Cavs, White Claws, Dark Dagger*] *Pest Control [Rewards: Amazing Xp, Level 100 combat to enter]* *Gladiators [Rewards: Anger mace, Anger sword, Anger spear, Anger staff and more]* Player Killing Areas *Jad/Chaos Spots* *Highwild Bank* *Dark Altar Pking Spot* Max Players: 750 For more information go to www.pkislex.net (for list of even more features). Feel free to sign up on our forums http://pkislex.net/forums/ for lot's of information and help
Any suggestions at all list them below.
Cheers, Bezza

item.dc:creator: @goothan38 goothan38
item.description:
@goothan38 wrote:

Palidino76:

Did you have to change the size the client loaded some of the images or did all your spli pieces just fit without any hassle?

We sacrificed redstones for the fact that we couldn’t make them custom AND use the flipping method at the same time, at least we couldn’t figure out how. The client took a lot of work, but as you can see, it was definitely worth it

By the way, I’m Guthan in the pictures and I’m Guthan of rune-server.

Read full topic

~PkIsle X~

Welcome to the Revolution of PkIsle. With the help of an amazing staff of developers and web designers, and the testing, support, and suggestions from various players, we are proud to bring you PkIsle X.

Fully Evolved from what you used to know, but the same great features you used to love. We have enhanced this server far beyond expectations. We are a friendly community based on the commitment to create a unique server with a stable economy and an enjoyable atmosphere.

Equiped with mini-games, new maps, new weapons, new drops, new skill features, we are confident you will have a blast and meet some new people.

For a quick trailer go here:

http://www.youtube.com/v/A1n7K-exEY4

Or download it here for better quality

http://files.filefront.com//;8209264;;/

-Features-
Magic
Regular Magic Spells [Combat + Weakening + Binding + Telegrab]
Ancient Magic Spells [Effects]
Blood Runes
Projectiles + Emotes
Every single magic spell works
Range
DarkBow
ShortBows + LongBows
Arrow Requirements with Bows
Projectiles + Emotes
Throwing Projectiles [Knives and Obby Rings]
Combat
Weapon Special Attacks [DDS : x2; Whip : Max Hit; White Scimmy : Secret]
Armour + Barrows Stat Requirements
Correct Weapon Speeds
Weapon Emotes
RuneCrafting
Regular Alter [All Runes Besides Bloods and Deaths]
Dark Alter [Wilderness Alter Requires 90 RC, Bloods and Deaths]
Soul Tiara; x2 Runes, 1/2 Delay
Emotes + GFX
NO REQUIRED ESSENCE
Thieving
Various Stalls with Different Rewards + Level Requirements
Great Starter Cash!
Fishing
Various Fishing Spots
AutoFish Feature
Random Chance on Catching based on Level
Fishing Emotes
Cooking
AutoCook Feature
Random Burning based on Level
Cooking Emotes
Woodcutting
AutoCut Feature
Speed Based on Axe
FireMaking
Fires on Ground
Deletes Log
Different Level Requirements and EXP Gained for Logs
FireMaking Emotes
Agility
Advanced Agility Course
Emotes + Crossing Log/Rope + Crawl through Tube
Agility ShortCuts To Be Added
Farming
Clear Patches
Plant Herb Seed
Wait for Growth
Plant actually GROWS
Smithing
Correct Interface
Levels and Bars Required
Mining
Mining Ore Speed based on Level
Random Gems
Slayer
First Monsters OutSide Portal
Slayer Tower With Many Monsters
Special Drops for Higher Monsters
Minigames
Khazard Adventure [Rewards : Khazard Torso, Cavs, White Claws, Dark Dagger]
Pest Control [Rewards: Amazing Xp, Level 100 combat to enter]
Gladiators [Rewards: Anger mace, Anger sword, Anger spear, Anger staff and more]
Player Killing Areas
Jad/Chaos Spots
Highwild Bank
Dark Altar Pking Spot
Max Players: 750
For more information go to www.pkislex.net (for list of even more features). Feel free to sign up on our forums http://pkislex.net/forums/ for lot’s of information and help

Any suggestions at all list them below.

Cheers,
Bezza
